name: Hotdog Quest: Mustard Mountain
description:
HOTDOG QUEST: MUSTARD MOUNTAIN

Controls:
 Movement:
  WASD
  Left stick on controller
  Right click (goes forward)

 Look:
  Mouse movement
  Right stick on controller
  Arrow keys

 Interact:
  Left click
  Enter key
  West face button on controller (X, square, etc)

 Jump:
  Spacebar
  South facebutton on controller (A, cross, etc)
  Middle click

 Sprint:
  Left shift
  Right trigger

Some command line options:

--normalres
 Disables pixelization

--normalfps
 Disables low fps
